verses.translation: About what are they asking one another?
About the great news -
That over which they are in disagreement.
No! They are going to know.
Then, no! They are going to know.
Have We not made the earth a resting place?
And the mountains as stakes?
And We created you in pairs
And made your sleep [a means for] rest
And made the night as clothing
And made the day for livelihood
And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]
verses.transliteration: Wa banaina fauqakum sab 'an shi daada

verses.translation: And made [therein] a burning lamp
And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water
verses.transliteration: Wa anzalna minal m'usiraati maa-an saj-jaaja

verses.translation: That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation
verses.transliteration: Linukh rija bihee habbaw wana baata

verses.translation: And gardens of entwined growth.
Indeed, the Day of Judgement is an appointed time -

verses.arabic: یَوۡمَ یُنفَخُ فِی ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجࣰا
verses.translation: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes
verses.transliteration: Yauma yun fakhu fis-soori fataa toona afwaaja

verses.translation: And the heaven is opened and will become gateways
verses.transliteration: Wa futiha tis samaa-u fakaanat abwaaba

verses.translation: And the mountains are removed and will be [but] a mirage.
verses.transliteration: Wa suyyi raatil jibaalu fa kaanat saraaba

verses.translation: Indeed, Hell has been lying in wait
For the transgressors, a place of return,
In which they will remain for ages [unending].

verses.arabic: لَّا یَذُوقُونَ فِیهَا بَرۡدࣰا وَلَا شَرَابًا
verses.translation: They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink
verses.transliteration: Laa ya zooqoona feeha bar daw walaa sharaaba

verses.translation: Except scalding water and [foul] purulence -
An appropriate recompense.
Indeed, they were not expecting an account
And denied Our verses with [emphatic] denial.
verses.transliteration: Wa kazzabu bi aayaa tina kizzaba

verses.translation: But all things We have enumerated in writing.
verses.transliteration: Wa kulla shai-in ahsai naahu kitaa ba

verses.translation: "So taste [the penalty], and never will We increase you except in torment."
verses.transliteration: Fa zooqoo falan-nazee dakum ill-laa azaaba

verses.translation: Indeed, for the righteous is attainment -
Gardens and grapevines
And full-breasted [companions] of equal age
And a full cup.

verses.arabic: لَّا یَسۡمَعُونَ فِیهَا لَغۡوࣰا وَلَا كِذَّ ٰ⁠بࣰا
verses.translation: No ill speech will they hear therein or any falsehood -
verses.transliteration: Laa yasma'oona fiha lagh waw walaa kizzaba

verses.translation: [As] reward from your Lord, [a generous] gift [made due by] account,

verses.arabic: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَیۡنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِۖ لَا یَمۡلِكُونَ مِنۡهُ خِطَابࣰا
verses.translation: [From] the Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Most Merciful. They possess not from Him [authority for] speech.
verses.transliteration: Rabbis samaa waati wal ardi wa maa baina humar rahmaani laa yam likoona minhu khi taaba

verses.arabic: یَوۡمَ یَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلۡمَلَـٰۤىِٕكَةُ صَفࣰّاۖ لَّا یَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابࣰا
verses.translation: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except for one whom the Most Merciful permits, and he will say what is correct.
verses.transliteration: Yauma yaqoo mur roohu wal malaa-ikatu saf-fal laa yata kalla moona illa man azina lahur rahmaanu wa qaala sawaaba

verses.arabic: ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ ٱلۡیَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَاۤءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
verses.translation: That is the True Day; so he who wills may take to his Lord a [way of] return.
verses.transliteration: Zaalikal yaumul haqqu faman shaa-at ta khaaza ill-laa rabbihi ma-aaba

verses.arabic: إِنَّاۤ أَنذَرۡنَـٰكُمۡ عَذَابࣰا قَرِیبࣰا یَوۡمَ یَنظُرُ ٱلۡمَرۡءُ مَا قَدَّمَتۡ یَدَاهُ وَیَقُولُ ٱلۡكَافِرُ یَـٰلَیۡتَنِی كُنتُ تُرَ ٰ⁠بَۢا
verses.translation: Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment on the Day when a man will observe what his hands have put forth and the disbeliever will say, "Oh, I wish that I were dust!"
verses.transliteration: In naa anzar naakum azaaban qareebaiy-yauma yan zurul marr-u maa qaddamat yadaahu wa ya qoolul-kaafiru yaa lai tanee kuntu turaaba
